analysis.key_quote: This proposal would appear to make those staffing positions subject to the loss of civil service protections, which will disincentivize staff from taking the positions, to everyone's detriment.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the loss of job security and civil service protections, which indicates opposition to the proposed rule. It highlights the potential negative impact on attracting qualified employees and the risks to institutional knowledge, aligning with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
